March 1917,*SECRET.WAR CABINET, 86.Minutes of a Meeting of the War Cabinet held at 10, Downing Street, S.W., onFriday, March 2, 1917, at 3 p.m.Present :The Prime Minister (in the Chair).The Right Hon. A. Bonar Law, M.P.Also Present :The Right Hon. Sir E. Carson, K.C., M.P., First Lord of the Admiralty.Ireland. The War Cabinet had a discussion on the Irish question.(Initialled) D. LI. Gr.2, Whitehall Gardens, S,W,,March 2, 1917.o
